abstract: People are wagering on the S.E.C. case against Goldman Sachs and the fate of Lloyd C. Blankfein in an online futures market.
snippet: People are wagering on the S.E.C. case against Goldman Sachs and the fate of Lloyd C. Blankfein in an online futures market.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs, if you listen to Congress, is little more than a casino where gamblers masquerade as traders and bet on the fortunes of the rest of us. Well, now the rest of us can bet on Goldman.

headline.main: Think Blankfein Will Resign? Want to Bet?
headline.print_headline: Think Blankfein Will Resign? Want to Bet?
